meanings.definition: A person who tends to be hopeful and confident about the future.
meanings.sent1: Many optimists believe that everything will turn out well in the end.
meanings.sent2: Optimists often see the bright side of situations and remain positive.
meanings.sent3: The optimists in the group were always smiling and spreading cheer.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of pessimists, the optimists shine like beacons of hope.
meanings.sent5: The optimists' unwavering faith in a better tomorrow inspired others to stay positive.

meanings.definition: Those who believe that good things will happen.
meanings.sent1: The optimists in the crowd were convinced that luck was on their side.
meanings.sent2: Optimists trust that the universe will bring them the happiness they deserve.
meanings.sent3: Even when faced with challenges, the optimists remained steadfast in their belief in good outcomes.
meanings.sent4: Like magnets, optimists attract positivity and good fortune into their lives.
meanings.sent5: The optimists' unwavering faith in a brighter future was truly contagious.
